content: ***update **swedish** translation available please click on the update link to diana ritzen s translation on my website *** the tiny baby snowman pattern provides instructions for crocheting a petite and adorable little snowman he is all bundled up and cozy with his hat and scarf this pattern is very quick to work up and great as a christmas tree ornament last-minute holiday gift or décor to show your winter holiday spirit --- finished measurements height with hat not including pom-pom approximately 3¾ inches 9 cm level advanced beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below joining rounds and basic sewing skills stitches/terms used written in us terminology magic_ring magic_ring a k a magic_ring magic loop chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook yarn over pull through both loops decrease decrease single_crochet two stitches together increase increase two single_crochet in same stitch blo back loops only materials worsted medium weight 4 yarn in white green and red yarn scraps in orange and brown 2 75 mm crochet hook fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors plastic safety eyes optional small button or appliques for embellishment --- this pattern is © 2017 jasmin wang sylemn s sweet softies for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sylemn s sweet softies as the designer and link to my etsy shop or facebook page no wholesale www sweetsofties com www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties
